examples.comment_3: Set up {{TextTextSearchCriteria}} to find watermark text

content.title: **[{{ProdFullName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** helps {{EnvName}} developers easily update watermarks in various {{FileformatCap}} files. Here's how you can use it in your project:
content.step_1: First, open your {{FileformatCap}} file by passing it to the {{TextWatermarkerBold}} constructor. You can use a file path, byte stream, or file stream.
content.step_2: Then, find the watermarks you want to change using {{TextSearchCriteriaBold}}, which lets you search for watermark text or properties.
content.step_3: Once found, you can change details like text, font, size, position, color, and more. This gives you full control over how the watermark looks.
content.step_4: After making changes, save the document. You can write the result to a stream or a file path.

more_features.title: Discover more ways to update watermarks
more_features.description: With our library, {{EnvName}} apps can add, find, edit, or delete watermarks in many file types.

feature_1.title: Watermark Your Files with Ease
feature_1.content: Use {{ProdFullName}} to add and manage watermarks in your documents. Search, update, or remove watermarks as needed using a simple API.

feature_2.title: Customize Watermarks to Fit Your Needs
feature_2.content: Adjust watermark settings like font, size, orientation, and color using our flexible API to get exactly the result you want.

feature_3.title: Use Format-Specific Features
feature_3.content: Depending on the file format, you can use native features like headers, footers, annotations, or backgrounds as watermark areas.

code_1.title: Edit Text Watermark in Excel
code_1.content: This code shows how to change watermark text in Excel spreadsheets.
